sections.title: What is Web Development?
sections.script: Explore the world of web development, understanding the difference between frontend and backend, and how they work together.

sections.title: Setting Up Your Development Environment
sections.script: Learn how to install and configure essential tools like VS Code, Node.js, and Git for web development.

sections.title: HTML Document Structure
sections.script: Understand the anatomy of an HTML document including doctype, head, and body elements.

sections.title: Working with Text and Links
sections.script: Master headings, paragraphs, formatting tags, and creating hyperlinks in HTML.

sections.title: Introduction to CSS
sections.script: Discover how CSS styles HTML elements and learn about selectors, properties, and values.

sections.title: The Box Model
sections.script: Deep dive into margin, border, padding, and content - the foundation of CSS layout.

sections.title: Media Queries
sections.script: Learn how to create responsive layouts that adapt to different screen sizes using media queries.

sections.title: Flexbox Layout
sections.script: Master the flexbox layout system for creating flexible and responsive page structures.

sections.title: What is React?
sections.script: Understand React's component-based architecture and why it's a popular choice for building UIs.

sections.title: Your First React App
sections.script: Build your first React application and understand the basic project structure and workflow.

sections.title: Creating Components
sections.script: Learn how to create functional and class components in React.

sections.title: Passing Props
sections.script: Understand how to pass data between components using props for reusable interfaces.

sections.title: Understanding State
sections.script: Explore React state and how it differs from props, enabling interactive components.

sections.title: useState Hook
sections.script: Master the useState hook for managing component state in functional components.

sections.title: Event Handling Basics
sections.script: Learn how to handle user interactions like clicks, input changes, and form submissions.

sections.title: Forms in React
sections.script: Build controlled components and manage form data effectively in React applications.

sections.title: Variables and Data Types
sections.script: Learn about var, let, const and different data types in JavaScript.

sections.title: Functions
sections.script: Master function declarations, expressions, and arrow functions in JavaScript.

sections.title: Working with Objects
sections.script: Understand JavaScript objects, properties, methods, and object manipulation.

sections.title: Array Methods
sections.script: Master essential array methods like map, filter, reduce, forEach, and more.

sections.title: Callbacks and Promises
sections.script: Learn how to handle asynchronous operations using callbacks and promises.

sections.title: Async/Await
sections.script: Write cleaner asynchronous code using the modern async/await syntax.

sections.title: Selecting Elements
sections.script: Learn different methods to select and access DOM elements in JavaScript.

sections.title: Modifying the DOM
sections.script: Master techniques for creating, updating, and removing DOM elements dynamically.

sections.title: What is UI/UX Design?
sections.script: Understand the difference between UI and UX and their importance in product design.

sections.title: Design Thinking Process
sections.script: Learn the five stages of design thinking: empathize, define, ideate, prototype, and test.

sections.title: Conducting User Interviews
sections.script: Master the art of gathering user insights through effective interviewing techniques.

sections.title: Creating User Personas
sections.script: Build realistic user personas to guide design decisions and improve user experience.

sections.title: Low-Fidelity Wireframes
sections.script: Learn to create quick wireframes to visualize layout and structure before detailed design.

sections.title: Interactive Prototypes
sections.script: Build clickable prototypes to test user flows and gather feedback early in the process.

sections.title: Introduction to Node.js
sections.script: Understand what Node.js is, how it works, and why it's popular for backend development.

sections.title: NPM and Package Management
sections.script: Learn how to use NPM to manage packages and dependencies in Node.js projects.

sections.title: Setting Up Express
sections.script: Create your first Express server and understand the basics of routing and middleware.

sections.title: Building RESTful APIs
sections.script: Design and implement RESTful APIs using Express with proper HTTP methods and status codes.

sections.title: Custom Middleware
sections.script: Create and use custom middleware for logging, authentication, and request processing.

sections.title: Error Handling Strategies
sections.script: Implement robust error handling to create reliable and user-friendly APIs.

sections.title: Relational vs NoSQL
sections.script: Compare relational and NoSQL databases to understand when to use each type.

sections.title: Database Design Principles
sections.script: Learn normalization, relationships, and best practices for designing efficient databases.

sections.title: Basic SQL Queries
sections.script: Master SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, and DELETE statements for data manipulation.

sections.title: Joins and Relationships
sections.script: Understand different types of SQL joins and how to query related data across tables.

sections.title: Introduction to MongoDB
sections.script: Learn about document-based databases and MongoDB's flexible schema approach.

sections.title: CRUD Operations
sections.script: Perform create, read, update, and delete operations in MongoDB collections.

sections.title: What is Artificial Intelligence?
sections.script: Explore the definition, history, and different types of artificial intelligence.

sections.title: Machine Learning vs Deep Learning
sections.script: Understand the differences between traditional ML and deep learning approaches.

sections.title: Supervised Learning
sections.script: Learn about classification and regression problems in supervised learning.

sections.title: Unsupervised Learning
sections.script: Explore clustering and dimensionality reduction in unsupervised learning.

sections.title: Introduction to Neural Networks
sections.script: Understand how artificial neural networks mimic the human brain to solve complex problems.

sections.title: Training Neural Networks
sections.script: Learn about backpropagation, gradient descent, and optimization techniques.

sections.title: Getting Started with Python
sections.script: Install Python, set up your environment, and write your first Python program.

sections.title: Variables and Data Types
sections.script: Learn about Python's dynamic typing system and built-in data types.

sections.title: Conditionals
sections.script: Master if, elif, and else statements for decision-making in Python.

sections.title: Loops
sections.script: Use for and while loops to iterate over data and repeat operations.

sections.title: Defining Functions
sections.script: Create reusable functions with parameters, return values, and default arguments.

sections.title: Working with Modules
sections.script: Import and use built-in modules and create your own custom modules.

sections.title: Lists and Tuples
sections.script: Work with ordered collections using lists and immutable tuples in Python.

sections.title: Dictionaries and Sets
sections.script: Use dictionaries for key-value pairs and sets for unique collections.

sections.title: Why Performance Matters
sections.script: Understand the business impact of website performance on user experience and conversions.

sections.title: Measuring Performance
sections.script: Learn to use tools like Lighthouse, WebPageTest, and Chrome DevTools to measure performance.

sections.title: Image Optimization
sections.script: Optimize images using compression, lazy loading, and modern formats like WebP.

sections.title: Code Splitting
sections.script: Reduce initial bundle size by splitting code and loading resources on demand.

sections.title: JavaScript Performance
sections.script: Optimize JavaScript execution, avoid memory leaks, and reduce rendering bottlenecks.

sections.title: CSS Performance
sections.script: Write efficient CSS selectors and minimize layout thrashing for smooth animations.

sections.title: What is Full-Stack Development?
sections.script: Understand the role of a full-stack developer and the technologies involved.

sections.title: Tech Stack Selection
sections.script: Learn how to choose the right frontend, backend, and database technologies for your project.

sections.title: Connecting Frontend to Backend
sections.script: Make API calls from your frontend and handle responses effectively.

sections.title: State Management
sections.script: Manage application state across frontend and backend using Redux or Context API.

sections.title: User Authentication
sections.script: Implement secure authentication using JWT tokens and session management.

sections.title: Security Best Practices
sections.script: Protect your application from common vulnerabilities like XSS, CSRF, and SQL injection.

sections.title: Preparing for Production
sections.script: Optimize your application and configure it for production deployment.

sections.title: Deploying Full-Stack Apps
sections.script: Deploy your frontend and backend to cloud platforms like Vercel, Netlify, and Heroku.
